name: Intermediate High Chinese II
description: This course is designed for students who can function in daily life with Chinese. Potential students for this course are able to speak and understand Chinese in some dialects (e.g. Cantonese) or Mandarin; and are able to read and write Chinese (in traditional or simplified script) at intermediate level. This course will introduce phonetic knowledge, develop and strengthen students' speaking skill in Mandarin as well as improve their competence in reading and writing in Modern Standard Chinese at the intermediate high level. [24L, 24P]
prerequisites: CHI101H5 or appropriated language level as indicated by the language assessment questionnaire.
exclusions: CHI200Y5, CHI201Y5, CHI201H5, EAS200Y1, EAS201H1, LGGB60H3, LGGB61H3, LGGB62H3, LGGB63H3, LGGB64H3, and LGGB65H3
